title: KTM Drip

description.plain:
On KTM Drip, Chicago rapper Juice WRLD raps about his desire for money, women, and living a carefree lifestyle.

The song was first ]previewed](https://youtu.be/xIE0UtWwNUE?si=76cLmMW90xs3eklx) by thereallukee in an Instagram post on January 3, 2019. After a leak on March 9, 2022, it officially dropped on November 29, 2024, as the 6th track on Juice WRLD’s posthumous album The Party Never Ends.

embed_content: Read “KTM Drip” by Juice WRLD on Genius
recording_location: Rented Home Recording Studio, West Hollywood, Los Angeles, California

album.full_title: The Party Never Ends (Deluxe) by Juice WRLD
album.name: The Party Never Ends (Deluxe)

On KTM Drip, Chicago rapper Juice WRLD raps about his desire for money, women, and living a carefree lifestyle.

The song was first ]previewed](https://youtu.be/xIE0UtWwNUE?si=76cLmMW90xs3eklx) by thereallukee in an Instagram post on January 3, 2019. After a leak on March 9, 2022, it officially dropped on November 29, 2024, as the 6th track on Juice WRLD’s posthumous album The Party Never Ends.
